title: [娱乐]Rifle'sChair ——新版本的轻量椅子插件[1.14.x]
author: youngklps
txt_content:
本帖最后由 youngklps 于 2019-8-6 14:30 编辑 


Rifle's Chairs来福的椅子楼主参加模拟**会议回来了！更新帖子2018.8.11

零、授权




QQ截图20180805121419.jpg (31.61 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2018-8-5 12:16 上传





一、功能 function
正如老版本的椅子插件一样，它可以为玩家提供坐在椅子上的功能。额外的是，它是为新版本制作的插件。Just as the old-version-based chair plugins,this one could offer the function of allowing players sit on the chairs.More over,it's made for the latest version.Maybe it's the only one which supports 1.13.[size=14.6667px]这个小项目成为了有1000+服务器使用的高度可自定义而简单的椅子插件.[size=14.6667px]What started off as a small coding project became a highly-configurable yet simple chair plugin that has a 1000+ consistent servers count.

10,000 downloads?!?!?

You guys are absolutely insane! When I started this, I never expected a simple chair plugin to be hitting the top charts let alone 10,000 downloads.

回想起来, 我很高兴我决定开发这个插件. 让这个插件成为有志者事竟成的象征吧!Looking back, I'm so happy that I decided to make this plugin. Let this plugin be the sole reminder to anyone that even simple, barebones concepts can make it when you put tons of heart into it!

三、权限及配置文件(最后更新于2019.8.5)
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.use: 使用椅子的权限
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.mute: 忽略消息权限
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.reset: 重置
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.reload: 重载配置文件
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.toggle: 切换是否能够坐下
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.priority: 权限等级,用于抢走其他坐着的玩家的座位
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.notify: 更新提示
[size=13.3333px]rfchairs.manage: 允许用户重载,更新[size=13.3333px]# Rifle's Chair plugin by Rifle D. Luffy
[size=13.3333px]# Version 4.0
[size=13.3333px]# #=============[Seat Configuration]=============##
[size=13.3333px]# exit-seat-where-facing: Exit the seat where you are facing.
[size=13.3333px]# max-distance: the maximum distance a player can be in order to sit on the seat
[size=13.3333px]# max-item-count-to-sit: If they have more than this, they can't sit. Example: >10 dirt cannot sit
[size=13.3333px]# set it to -1 to cancel.
[size=13.3333px]# require-signs-at-end: checks for signs at the end of a seat; false by default
[size=13.3333px]# priority-on-if-has-perm: if they have the perm rfchairs.priority, they will be allowed to replace users
[size=13.3333px]# allow-trap-door-chairs: allows the player to sit on a chair that resembles a "throne"
[size=13.3333px]# require-empty-hand: players must have no items in their hand to sit
[size=13.3333px]# #=============[When Damaged By an Entity]=============##
[size=13.3333px]# eject-player-on-damage: Should it eject players of their seats when damaged?
[size=13.3333px]# minimum-eject-damage: The minumum damage needed to toss a player out of their seat
[size=13.3333px]# face-attacker-when-ejected: Should the attacked face the attacker when hit out of their seat?
[size=13.3333px]# #=============[Tossing players out of seats]=============##
[size=13.3333px]# toss-player: will the players be tossed when they
[size=13.3333px]# toss-velocity: the velocity of the attacked when knocked out of their seat
